Package database.dao

Class SolvedProblemsDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.dao.SolvedProblemsDatabase
public class SolvedProblemsDatabase extends Object
Wraps raw SQL connections to the problem_user table in a more accessible API. This table acts as a many-to-many join table between the problem and user table. It is used to mark problems as solved by users.
Version:
- June 4th 2023
Author:
Tommy Shan

    • markAsSolved

      public void markAsSolved(int userId, int problemId) throws SQLException
      markAsSolved Marks a problem with a specified id as solved by a user with a specified id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user who solved the problem
      problemId - the id of the solved problem
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

      Parameters:

      Returns:
